  • public class ItemList
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Martina on 16-02-29. This class contains a few functions for a list of items to make it easier to control. Also benefits as a sort of ADT to the app.
    Author:
    Adam, Andrew, Erin, Laura, Martina
